rukus.text: 74|32|Kakhano'i na [1], camdera sapatha
74|33|sapatha ratera, yakhana tara abasana ghate
74|34|sapatha prabhatakalera, yakhana ta alokojjbala haya
74|35|niscaya jahannama bhayabaha bipadasamuhera an'yatama
74|36|manusera jan'ya satarkakarisbarupa
74|37|tomadera madhye ye agrasara hate caya kimba ye pichiye parate caya tara jan'ya [1].
74|38|Pratyeka byakti nija krtakarmera daye abad'dha [1]
74|39|tabe danapanthira naya
74|40|baga-bagicara madhye tara eke aparake jijnesa karabe –
74|41|aparadhidera samparke
74|42|‘Tomaderake kise ‘sakara’- e niksepa kareche?’
74|43|Tara balabe, ‘amara salata adayakaridera antarbhukta chilama na [1]
74|44|ara amara abhabagrastake khadya dana karatama na [1]
74|45|ebam amara anarthaka alapakaridera sathe behuda alape magna thakatama.
74|46|Ara amara pratidana dibase mithyaropa karatama
74|47|abasese amadera kache mrtyu agamana kare [1].’
74|48|Phale suparisakaridera suparisa tadera kono upakara karabe na [1].
74|49|Atahpara tadera ki hayeche ye, tara mukha phiriye neya upadesa hate
74|50|tara yena bhita-trasta haye palayanarata ekapala gadha
74|51|yara sinhera bhaye palayana kareche [1].
74|52|Baram tadera madhyakara pratyeke'i kamana kare ye, take ekati unmukta grantha deya hoka [1].
74|53|Kakhano naya [1]; baram tara akheratake bhaya kare na [2].
74|54|Niscaya e kura'ana to sakalera jan'ya upadesabani [1].
74|55|Ata'eba yara icche se ta theke upadesa grahana karuka.
74|56|Ara allahara icche chara ke'u upadesa grahana karate pare na; tini'i yogya ye, ekamatra tamra'i taka'oya abalambana kara habe, ara tini'i ksama karara adhikari [1].
